name: Bones and Puppies
description:
The protagonist is a skeleton named Skelly, who sets out to avenge his family, chewed on by puppies.

Game Design: Tancredi Cavallari, Marco Lagiongada, Emma Lanteri e Martina Salis

Level Design: Tancredi Cavallari, Marco Lagiongada, Emma Lanteri e Martina Salis

Programming: Marco Lagiongada

Environment Design (outside):  Tancredi Cavallari

Environment Design (inside): Emma Lanteri 

Sound Design: Emma Lanteri

Post-production: Martina Salis
